description: Generate mock data for testing and development purposes.

number_of_rows.info: Number of mock data records to generate (1-1000).

data_type.info: Type of mock data to generate. Choose from predefined templates or create custom data.

custom_schema.info: JSON schema defining the structure of custom data. Example: {"name": "string", "age": "integer", "email": "email"}

seed.info: Seed value for random number generation to ensure reproducible results.

text_key.info: The key to use for the text field in the Data objects.

errors.invalid_row_count: Number of rows must be greater than 0.
errors.missing_custom_schema: Custom schema is required when data type is set to 'custom'.
